madeWithLove: Made with love by Interaction Dynamics
requireWebcam: This game requires the access to your webcam.
runByPressing: Run by pressing [space] or clicking on the page
duringGreenRedLight: during the Green light and win.
holdStill: Hold still during the Red light or die.
ifYouAreOnSmartphone: If you are using a smartphone, we suggest you to place your smartphone on a table or use only easy mode. The vibrations while holding the smartphone will be considered as you moving.
pressSpace: Press [space] or click on the screen
